verbose_text: Although IL-21 promotes germinal center reactions and generation of ASC following protein immunization, Toll like receptor signaling can overcome deficits in IL-21 dependent humoral responses, suggesting IL-21 dependency of B cells for protective humoral responses may depend on the type of infection.
evidence: promotes germinal center reactions and generation of ASC following protein immunization                                                     , Toll-like receptor signaling can overcome deficits in IL-21
